item.title: Faceless Youtube Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for a creative YouTube video creator to help me make a faceless video for my channel. Here’s what I need:

Video Length: Around 25 minutes
Content Niche: Travel, geopolitics, and "what if" scenarios
Provided: I’ll give you the audio script
Your Job: Add sounds, footage, and effects to the script

Preferred Sources:
- Storyblocks
- Envato Elements
(But I'm open to other suggestions if you have better ideas!)

Requirements:
- Easy-going and great at communication
- Experience with similar projects
- Send me 3 examples of your previous work with a short description of each project

To make sure you read this, please include the word "pivot" in your message.



Posted On: June 18, 2024 10:49 UTC

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
I am trying to start up a business in Digital Marketing, selling ebooks and courses via Instagram.

Unfortunately, some of the tasks take more time for me to do than expected. I want my business to grow organically.
I write all captions myself, but I need someone to help me with the following:

Finalize content:
- Hashtag research - adding relevant hashtags to the captions
- Make reels using stock videos. I use Canva Pro right now.
- Add hooks and post the videos (7-14 reels per week).

Other:
- Help me create a better content strategy.
- I made an engagement strategy, that I also would like help to do each day (Mon - Fri) to increase the engagement on the account.
- I have some Canva templates that I want changed to fit my brand.

I use Trello to keep an overview of all content.

Because it is a new biz, I can't afford to pay a big salary now, but instead, I can offer a bonus 10% bonus for each product that is sold from the shop. (low ticket item = $4.99, and high ticket item = $499).

I am looking for someone who can do this every week for a long time.  

Hourly Range: $3.00-$6.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 10:50 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Canva, Instagram Marketing, Content Writing, Marketing Strategy, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Canva, Instagram Marketing, Content Writing, Marketing Strategy, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Instagram
Country: DNK
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor/ Video Maker - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented freelance video editor to join our SaaS startup. We need someone experienced in creating promotional and explainer videos for our products. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing their skills in video editing, storytelling, and animation. Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro and other essential tools. If you have a keen eye for detail, a creative mindset, and the ability to deliver high-quality videos that effectively communicate our product features and benefits, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $50

item.title: TikTok Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
need editor for videos for my tiktok

here are the videos I want, mostly the clips for my course. you need to be creative to know how to make a good video without me giving you instructions,espepcially when it comes to caption,.
thisis my acount: https://www.tiktok.com/@madison_ceo/video/7380953050992708906

here is some of the captions i like
https://www.tiktok.com/@realkingkhang/video/7377565659267353898?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc&web_id=7375467702548416043
https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZTNdyDYxU/
https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZTNdydAEb/
https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZTNdy7wcJ/
https://www.tiktok.com/@mentalitylions/video/7272456990490660129?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit raw footage into high-quality TikTok videos
  - Add effects, transitions, and text to enhance the videos
- Guarantee that there are no spelling, grammatical, or formatting mistakes in the captions.
- Ensure a high level of accuracy, as we have a zero-tolerance policy for errors.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong knowledge of TikTok trends and video formats
  - Creative thinking and ability to come up with innovative ideas


Requirements:
Exceptional attention to detail.
Strong command of English, including spelling and grammar.
Ability to work under strict deadlines and deliver consistent, error-free work.


Trial Requirement:
You will be given a trial caption to edit, If any mistakes are found, we will not proceed with hiring.

Compensation:
$15 per video with no revision, $10 per video with one revision.
3 videos per day



Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 10:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: VA Required To Record 2-Minute Loom Videos Audio Only (With Room To Grow) - Upwork
item.description:
Expanding real estate firm looking to recruit a rockstar virtual assistant to execute Loom recording tasks. Plenty of room for advancement and long-term employment if you’re competent, hard-working, and efficient.

Skills required:

- Excellent English is a MUST (both written and spoken)
- Knowledge of Google sheets

Technical requirements:

​​- MacBook laptop (2020 or newer)
- A fast and reliable internet connection

Job roles include but are not limited to…

- Recording videos to send to prospects (using pre-recorded audio, you won’t be required to
record videos yourself)

Note - put the number ‘37’ in your application so we know you’ve taken the time to read this
description!!

Required personal attributes:

- Strong work ethic
- Focus and efficiency
- Great English skills

Expect a long term role with plenty of room for growth. Approx 2-4 hours per day to start, but
this can grow if you are good!


Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 10:17 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Virtual Assistance
Skills: Virtual Assistance
Country: United States
click to apply
